personas.name: GPT-3
aliases: A large language model developed by OpenAI in 2020.
The successor to GPT-2.
The largest language model ever trained, as of 2020.
The first large language model with over 5B parameters, developed by OpenAI.
A language model, released via API by a leading startup based in San Francisco in 2020.
A machine learning model trained on a dataset of 300 billion tokens, that first showcased the ability to do in-context learning
GPT-3, a AI system released by OpenAI in 2020.
A transformer-based language model, available through the OpenAI API
A system introduced in the paper Language Models are Few-Shot Learner.
personas.description: GPT-3 is a transformer-based language model that was developed by the San-Francisco-based company OpenAI and released via API in 2020. It was the largest language model trained, as of 2020, with over 5 billion parameters and a dataset of 300 billion tokens. It is the successor to GPT-2 and the first large language model to showcase the ability to do in-context learning. GPT-3 was introduced in the paper Language Models are Few-Shot Learners, which demonstrated its natural language processing capabilities across various tasks without fine-tuning.

personas.name: Claude
aliases: An artificial intelligence system developed & released by Anthropic in 2022.
A rival to ChatGPT with better natural language processing capabilities and safety features.
An AI assistant created by former OpenAI employees, who founded a new company that focuses on AI alignment.
The first public chatbot produced by Anthropic, a startup founded by former OpenAI employees.
A language model trained using Constitutional AI, a framework for training AI agents to be aligned with human values.
One of the first impressive large language model chatbots not released by OpenAI.
An AI chatbot produced by a prominent San-Francisco-based AI startup that is not OpenAI.
A chatbot Claude, developed by Anthropic, an AI startup that announced it received $300M funding from Google in 2023.
A transformer language model, trained to act as a chatbot, that was announced weeks after ChatGPT by another AI company.
personas.description: Claude is an artificial intelligence system developed and released by Anthropic in 2022. It is a transformer language model trained to act as a chatbot that was announced weeks after ChatGPT. It is a rival to ChatGPT that claims to have better natural language processing capabilities and safety features. It uses a technique called Constitutional AI, which aims to align the chatbot with human values by providing a principle-based approach. Claude is the first public chatbot produced by Anthropic, a startup founded by former OpenAI employees who focus on AI alignment. Anthropic is a prominent San-Francisco-based AI startup that received $300M funding from Google in 2023.

personas.name: ChatGPT
aliases: An artificial intelligence system developed and released by OpenAI in 2022.
A chatbot built on top of OpenAI's GPT-3 family of large language models.
An AI assistant that interacts in a conversational way using dialogue format.
The first public chatbot produced by OpenAI that uses GPT-3 technology.
A language model fine-tuned using supervised and reinforcement learning techniques with human trainers.
One of the most impressive large language model chatbots released by OpenAI.
An AI chatbot produced by a prominent San-Francisco-based AI research lab that is backed by Microsoft.
A chatbot ChatGPT, developed by OpenAI, an AI research lab that announced it received $1B funding from Microsoft in 2019.
A transformer language model, trained to act as a chatbot, that was announced weeks before Claude by another AI company.
